name: METEID!
description:
Meteid! >BETA<

>>>>>>>>> By AlCentauri <<<<<<<<<

Meteid! is a simple game made using construct 2 for Devindo gamejam 2.

!!This game is still in development status!!

HOW TO PLAY :

A Or D to move ( For android, tap the left and right parts of the screen to move. )

Spacebar to trigger abilities ( For android, Double-tap the screen. )

Using tools :
Construct 2, Libresprite, Sfxr, And Bosca Ceoil
